entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:08 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 2:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -4.0°C
Wind: ENE 34 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets beginning early this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
